update.description: * Pomodairo 1.5 Release notes - Added a refresh database button to the DatabaseViewer to see changes to the data - On setting a task as done, the the close date is now set as well as reset if clicking done again (making the task not finished) - Added the ability to copy the name of the pomodoro to export it to a different file - Pomodoro and timer are now shown in taskbar. This can be turned off in the configuration. - Pomodoros are only counted when timer completes. - Configuration option to keep window on top. - If you delete an active pomodoro the timer will be stopped and cleared. - Made visual notification for time out more distinct.
